PerfectNetExp.abs: 在金卡纳（Gymkhana）环节中，大会以雪糕筒架构出复杂的赛道，当中包括蛇形绕行、大回旋及直线冲刺等不同形式的测试。教练指 …
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(G) -亿城英语 ... gymkana 运动会场 gymkhana 竞技场 gymnasia 室内体操场.

list.abs: gymkhana culture is the key part of humanistic Olympics . gymkhana culture at present in China was discussed and some suggestions were given .摘要赛场文化是“人文奥运”的重要组成部分。研究了当前我国赛场文化的现状，并提出了解决方案。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Urdu gend kānah 'racket court', from Hindi ges̄d 'ball' + Persian ḵānah 'house', altered by association with gymnastic

entry.def: A gymkhana is an event in which people ride horses in competition.

means.word_mean: 1. a meet at which riders and horses display a range of skills and aptitudes
